channel.title: [PI]Limits and Timers?[PI]
channel.description:
Hello, I'm AnonymousZ.
I'm struggling with how to add a limit to a place and a timer..
I need it so only 16 people can go through the portal, the 17th will get a message telling them it's too full..
Also, how do I add a timer. So after 2 minutes, 'x' amount of objects dissapear. After 15 minutes, the game ends.
This is basically, the Castle Wars portal method and the Clan Wars timer method..I've tried, and searched for guides..
Any help is appreciated!
[b]EDIT - SOMEONE GIVE ME AN ANSWER. DON'T JUST LOOK![/b]

item.title: [PI]Limits and Timers?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @AnonymousZ AnonymousZ
item.description:
@AnonymousZ wrote:

Hello, I’m AnonymousZ.

I’m struggling with how to add a limit to a place and a timer…

I need it so only 16 people can go through the portal, the 17th will get a message telling them it’s too full…

Also, how do I add a timer. So after 2 minutes, ‘x’ amount of objects dissapear. After 15 minutes, the game ends.

This is basically, the Castle Wars portal method and the Clan Wars timer method…I’ve tried, and searched for guides…

Any help is appreciated!
